keyword: calories in a mini reeses cup
title: Calories in a Mini Reese's Cup
meta_description: Discover calories in a mini Reese's cup, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown for this peanut butter treat.
h1: Calories in a Mini Reese's Cup
assumptions: Standard mini milk chocolate peanut butter cup (~9 g), no custom fillings or coatings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, exact size, and storage; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One mini Reese's cup contains about 45 kcal, with 1 g protein and 5 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one mini Reese's cup?
What are the carbs in a mini Reese's cup?
faqs.a: About 5 g total carbs, including 4 g sugars and 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is fat high in mini Reese's cups?
faqs.a: One has 3 g total fat, with 1.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a mini Reese's cup?
faqs.a: Roughly 1 g protein from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Do mini Reese's cups have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per mini cup.
